name: GolForever
description:
GolForever is a prototype golf game where the map is procedurally generate. So you won't play the same course twice in a row (or maybe it is).

It contain a lot of bugs (Its my 1º 3D Project with Unity) but with this project i wanted to learn about procedural generation and physics. 

Controls :

Mouse 0 (Left click mouse) = Aim to shoot. 

Mouse 3 (Well button mouse) = Move the camera.

WASD = Move arround.

R = Restart the level (Generate another one).

Z = Go back to the ball.

ESC = Pause Menu (Its bugged so dont use it so much) .

TAB = Scoreboard.
